story_28_10000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey! Are you listening to me, Hoopa?
Tomorrow is the semifinals!
story_28_10000/2401_1001_0200_10: We don’t have time to play around right now!
story_28_10000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Why, you little—! You DARE try to make a fool
out of me?
story_28_10000/2401_1001_0500_10: Fine! We’ll form our battle strategy later!
story_28_10000/2401_1001_0600_10:
In the meantime, I’m going to make you wish you
never provoked my wrath! Hah! I’m coming for
you, Hoopa!
story_28_10000/2401_1001_0700_10: Fancy running into you here of all places.
story_28_10000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You know...one of the reasons I created the PML
was so I could defeat you in a rematch.
story_28_10000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You showed up in my kingdom out of the blue,
crushed me when I’d been previously undefeated,
then disappeared again just like that...
story_28_10000/2401_1001_1300_10:
After that day, all I had to do was see your face,
and I’d be beside myself with rage...
story_28_10000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I vowed to annihilate you—to publicly humiliate
you in front of everyone!
story_28_10000/2401_1001_1700_10: I couldn’t care less about that now.
story_28_10000/2401_1001_1800_10: I only care about one thing...
story_28_10000/2401_1001_2000_10:
See you on the battlefield, Red. Just you wait...
I’m going to triumph tomorrow.
story_28_10000/2401_1001_2100_10: And then I’m going to defeat you in the finals!
